text:
The income of any self-employed person or freelance worker shall be prorated over a 12-month period for the purpose of determining eligibility for aid under this Article. 
(Amended by Ord. 212-80, App. 5/16/80; Ord. 152-98, App. 5/12/98)

heading.catch_text: PRORATION OF INCOME OF SELF-EMPLOYED AND FREELANCE WORKER OVER A TWELVE-MONTH PERIOD.
